excerpt: Wondering about the release date and time for The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14, along with where to watch it online? Here are the details.

text: The release date and time for The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 are just around the corner. Set in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, the series follows a dedicated team of doctors, nurses, and staff as they deal with high-stress situations, ethical challenges, and personal battles. The Pitt takes viewers to the Pittsburgh Trauma Medical Hospital, focusing on its E.R. department, which has limited resources and a heavy patient load. Expect to see intense medical scenarios, heartfelt moments, and a gripping sense of realism throughout each episode. So, here’s everything you need to know about when and where you can watch Episode 14 of The Pitt. When is the The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 release date & time? The episode’s release date is Thursday, April 3, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern Time April 3, 20259:00 PMPacific Time April 3, 20256:00 PM The first season of The Pitt debuted on January 9, 2025, featuring a double-episode premiere on its launch day. The series airs weekly on Thursdays and is scheduled to have a total of 15 episodes. Where to watch The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 You can watch The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 via Max. Owned by Warner Bros., Max is a popular subscription-based streaming platform that boasts an extensive collection of content from different studios. It provides a diverse array of entertainment options with unlimited access to thousands of television shows and films. Some of the popular titles you can watch from Max’s catalog include House of the Dragon, The Sex Lives of College Girls, The Penguin, and much more. What is The Pitt Season 1 about? The official synopsis for The Pitt is as follows: “The staff of Pittsburgh’s Trauma Medical Center work around the clock to save lives in an overcrowded and underfunded emergency department.“
html:
The release date and time for The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 are just around the corner. Set in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, the series follows a dedicated team of doctors, nurses, and staff as they deal with high-stress situations, ethical challenges, and personal battles. The Pitt takes viewers to the Pittsburgh Trauma Medical Hospital, focusing on its E.R. department, which has limited resources and a heavy patient load. Expect to see intense medical scenarios, heartfelt moments, and a gripping sense of realism throughout each episode.

So, here’s everything you need to know about when and where you can watch Episode 14 of The Pitt.

When is the The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is Thursday, April 3, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

The first season of The Pitt debuted on January 9, 2025, featuring a double-episode premiere on its launch day. The series airs weekly on Thursdays and is scheduled to have a total of 15 episodes.

Where to watch The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14

You can watch The Pitt Season 1 Episode 14 via Max.

Owned by Warner Bros., Max is a popular subscription-based streaming platform that boasts an extensive collection of content from different studios. It provides a diverse array of entertainment options with unlimited access to thousands of television shows and films. Some of the popular titles you can watch from Max’s catalog include House of the Dragon, The Sex Lives of College Girls, The Penguin, and much more.

What is The Pitt Season 1 about?

The official synopsis for The Pitt is as follows:

“The staff of Pittsburgh’s Trauma Medical Center work around the clock to save lives in an overcrowded and underfunded emergency department.“
